name: Glassmorphism
description: Translucent frosted-glass effect with vibrant backgrounds

characteristics.effects: blur, transparency, light borders, inner shadows

components.buttons: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/20 border border-white/30 rounded-xl px-6 py-3 font-medium hover:bg-white/30 transition-all
components.cards: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/10 border border-white/20 rounded-2xl p-6 shadow-xl
components.badges: backdrop-blur-sm bg-white/20 text-sm font-medium px-3 py-1 rounded-full

tailwindClasses.hero: min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center relative overflow-hidden
tailwindClasses.glassPanel: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/10 border border-white/20 rounded-3xl p-8 shadow-2xl
tailwindClasses.headline: text-5xl md:text-6xl font-bold text-white
tailwindClasses.cta: bg-white text-gray-900 hover:bg-white/90 rounded-xl px-8 py-4 text-lg font-semibold shadow-lg
tailwindClasses.ctaSecondary: backdrop-blur-md bg-white/10 border border-white/30 text-white rounded-xl px-8 py-4 text-lg hover:bg-white/20

doNot: Use low contrast text on glass
